MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.38am following reports of an underground cable fault at Perth Street substation and a faulty link box on Eyre Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.48am on Wednesday 11th November 2020.
